plot: A man goes to his work very early in the morning as he does every day. The careless behavior of the drivers (including himself) leads him into an accident. During his agony he begs for help...
title: Te espero del otro lado
plot_es: A man goes to his work very early in the morning as he does every day. The careless behavior of the drivers (including himself) leads him into an accident. During his agony he begs for help...
plot_en: A man goes to his work very early in the morning as he does every day. The careless behavior of the drivers (including himself) leads him into an accident. During his agony he begs for help...
